explainers1.title: Define & Achieve Your Goals
explainers1.text: Struggling to set clear goals? FitUp helps you define achievable objectives and effortlessly tracks your progress towards success.

explainers2.title: Effortless Food Tracking
explainers2.text: Easily track your daily meals with FitUp. Keeping tabs on your nutrition has never been simpler or more enjoyable!

explainers3.title: Feel the Burn & See Results
explainers3.text: Stay motivated with FitUp—every burn brings you closer to your goals. Temporary discomfort leads to lasting success.

explainers4.title: Visualize Your Progress
explainers4.text: Track every step of your journey with FitUp and clearly see your progress, keeping you motivated to go even further.

information.title: Track Your Goal
information.text: This helps us learn more about you!

fatLoss.title: Fat Loss
fatLoss.description: I want to lose body fat and build muscle definition

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: I want to maintain my current physique and overall health

muscleGain.title: Muscle Gain
muscleGain.description: I want to build muscle mass and increase overall strength

selectingGoals.title: Select Your Goals
selectingGoals.description: Choose your primary goal to help us tailor your experience.

success.title: Welcome in FitUp family!
success.text: Your profile is complete. Now you can start tracking your progress and achieving your goals.
